extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   CHEM211 & CHEM212
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from CHEM223; CHEM282; CHEM285.

basic.description: Mechanistically oriented study of organic reactions with emphasis on applications to synthesis. The laboratory affords experience in organic synthesis. Winter Term. NOTE    Laboratory consumables: estimated cost $20.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Organic Reactions
